types.section:
{{fr-adv}}

# {{lb|fr|informal}} [[one-to-one]], describing a meeting between just two persons

====Usage notes====
A {{IPAchar|/z/}} is usually inserted between ''[[quatre]]'' and ''[[yeux]]'' for euphony. While the {{w|Académie française}} recommends the spelling ''entre quatre yeux'', it may also be spelled to reflect the additional sound, e.g. ''entre quatre-z-yeux''.
types.html:
entre quatre yeux

  1. (informal) one-to-one, describing a meeting between just two persons

Usage notes

[edit]

A /z/ is usually inserted between quatre and yeux for euphony. While the Académie française recommends the spelling entre quatre yeux, it may also be spelled to reflect the additional sound, e.g. entre quatre-z-yeux.
trans: one-to-one, describing a meeting between just two persons

title: entre quatre yeux
pronunSection: * {{fr-IPA|entre quatres‿yeux|entre quattes‿yeux|qual2=less formal|entre quatre‿yeux|qual3=highly careful|entre quatre yeux|qual4=highly careful}}
